Item2.Name: Sauce Labs Bike Light
Item2.DescOfItem: A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding your bike at night. Water-resistant with 3 lighting modes, 1 AAA battery included.

Item3.Name: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt
Item3.DescOfItem: Get your testing superhero on with the Sauce Labs bolt T-shirt. From American Apparel, 100% ringspun combed cotton, heather gray with red bolt.
